clinical_study.brief_title: Cirrhosis, Effects of TRAnsplantation and Diabetes
clinical_study.official_title: Insulin Secretion and Sensitivity in Subjects With Liver Cirrhosis Undergoing Orthotopic Liver Transplantation (OLT): Pre- and Post-OLT Analysis

lead_sponsor.agency: Fondazione IRCCS Ca' Granda, Ospedale Maggiore Policlinico

clinical_study.source: Fondazione IRCCS Ca' Granda, Ospedale Maggiore Policlinico

brief_summary.textblock: This observational study is aimed at assessing insulin secretion and sensitivity by the use of a mathematical modeling from oral glucose tolerance test in subjects with liver cirrhosis undergoing orthotopic liver transplantation (OLT), before and at various time points after OLT.

primary_outcome.measure: Relationship of insulin secretion and sensitivity with the development of abnormalities of glucose metabolism after OLT
primary_outcome.description: Relation between baseline values and changes with transplantation of measures of insulin secretion and sensitivity, as derived from of the analysis of OGTT by the use of a mathematical model (i.e. proportional and derivative control for insulin secretion and oral glucose insulin sensitivity - OGIS - for insulin sensitivity ) and the development of abnormalities of glucose metabolism after OLT.

secondary_outcome.measure: Relationship of insulin secretion and sensitivity with morbidity and mortality after OLT
secondary_outcome.description: Relation between baseline values and changes with transplantation of measures of insulin secretion and sensitivity, as derived from of the analysis of OGTT by the use of a mathematical model (i.e. proportional and derivative control for insulin secretion and oral glucose insulin sensitivity - OGIS - for insulin sensitivity ) and morbidity and mortality after OLT.

secondary_outcome.measure: Relationship of insulin secretion and sensitivity with the development of the metabolic syndrome after OLT
secondary_outcome.description: Relation between baseline values and changes with transplantation of measures of insulin secretion and sensitivity, as derived from of the analysis of OGTT by the use of a mathematical model (i.e. proportional and derivative control for insulin secretion and oral glucose insulin sensitivity - OGIS - for insulin sensitivity ) and the development of the metabolic syndrome and its components (impaired glucose metabolism, central obesity, dyslipidemia and hypertension) after OLT.

other_outcome.measure: Prevalence and incidence of impaired glucose metabolism (IFG, IGT and diabetes)
other_outcome.description: Prevalence of unknown diabetes mellitus or IGT (normal levels of fasting glucose and HbA1c) pre-OLT and incidence of new-onset diabetes after transplantation (NODAT) or IFG/IGT

other_outcome.measure: Prevalence and incidence of the metabolic syndrome and its components (central) obesity , dyslipidemia and hypertension
other_outcome.description: Prevalence of the metabolic syndrome and its components (National Cholesterol Education Program - Adult Treatment Panel criteria, 2004 revision) pre-OLT and incidence of new-onset metabolic syndrome after transplantation
Morbidity and mortality from OLT-related and unrelated causes, including rejection, infection, and cardiovascular disease

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
Subjects with end-stage liver cirrhosis in waiting list for orthotopic liver transplantation at the Fondazione IRCCS Cà Granda - Ospedale Maggiore Policlinico, Milan, Italy
Exclusion Criteria:
- Known diabetes
- Cystic fibrosis
- Pregnancy
